title: Kareena Kapoor, Varun Dhawan, Arjun Kapoor ... Here Are All The Celebrity Showstoppers From Lakme Fashion Week!
text:
Follow @iDivaOfficial This is dummy error meassage 
What's a fashion show without a showstopper to add to the excitement and glamour? And when it comes to Lakmé Fashion Week, almost every show has one star bigger than the next, to give the shows that something extra. This season saw a lot of shows concluded by a mix of Bollywood, television and fashion celebrities, and it was definitely a treat to behold. Take a look at all the showstoppers from Lakmé Fashion Week Summer-Resort 2017.
